sentences.sentence: This new piece of evidence invalidates his version of events.
sentences.translation: 这条新证据推翻了他对事件经过的说法。

sentences.sentence: Flush_all - Invalidates (or expires) all the current items in the cache.
sentences.translation: flush_all—让缓存内的所有当前条目无效(或到期失效)。

sentences.sentence: One example is class loading that invalidates monomorphic call transformations.
sentences.translation: 一个例子是使单态调用转换失效的类装载。
